privacy-check.label: I confirm that I have read and understood the Data Protection statement above.

start.title: Landlords make a report
start.p1: Before making a report you must be confident that an existing occupier on whom you carried out initial checks at the start of their tenancy no longer has the right to rent by checking their relevant documents.
start.p2: If the documents are being held by the Home Office or the person has an outstanding application or appeal, you must get verification from the Home Office first regarding the person’s ongoing right to rent.
start.p3: If you have not carried out further document checks on someone who is renting your property, but you suspect a person is in the UK illegally, you can report them in confidence by using the immigration crime reporting service.
start.p4: If you have problems accessing these forms or need help completing them, call the Landlords' Helpline on 0300 790 6268

tenancy-start.title: Landlords make a report
tenancy-start.header: When did the person move into your property?

property-address.title: Landlords make a report
property-address.p1: The address must be in England. You do not need to check a tenant's right to rent for properties in Wales, Scotland or Northern Ireland.

privacy.title: Landlords make a report
privacy.p1: The personal information entered on this form will be used for immigration control purposes. It may also be used to support the work of the Home Office and to prevent and detect fraud. The Home Office is the data controller in relation to the information provided, which will be processed in accordance with the Data Protection Act 2018.
privacy.p2: To ensure the security of the information provided we will only send responses to the email address that the landlord entered on the form. For further information on how the Home Office uses personal data, please see our Personal information charter.

privacy-declaration.title: Landlords make a report
privacy-declaration.p1: Thank you for making a report to the Home Office about an existing occupant who no longer has the right to rent.
privacy-declaration.p2: An email containing the details of the report has been sent to the address you provided. The email contains a unique reference number which you should keep safe, as you may need it to prove that you’re not liable for a civil penalty.

move-date.required: Tell us when the person moved into your property
move-date.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/URL into your answers
move-date.before: This date must not be in the future
move-date.after: This service only applies to tenancy agreements that started after 30 November 2014

tenant-full-name.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/url into your answers
tenant-full-name.maxlength: Full name must be 1000 characters or less

tenant-dob.required: Please enter the tenant's date of birth
tenant-dob.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/URL into your answers
tenant-dob.over18: Date of birth entered must reflect 18 years or older

tenant-nationality.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/URL into your answers

address-line-1.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/URL into your answers
address-line-1.maxlength: Address line 1 must be 250 characters or less

address-line-2.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/URL into your answers
address-line-2.maxlength: Address line 2 must be 250 characters or less

town-or-city.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/URL into your answers
town-or-city.maxlength: Town/City must be 250 characters or less

county.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/URL into your answers
county.maxlength: County must be 250 characters or less

postcode.required: Enter the postcode of the rental property
postcode.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/URL into your answers
postcode.regex: Your postcode is not in England. If your property is not in England, you do not have to do a right to rent check
postcode.postcode: Your postcode is not in England. If your property is not in England, you do not have to do a right to rent check

landlord-full-name.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/URL into your answers
landlord-full-name.maxlength: Landlord's or agent's full name must be 1000 characters or less

company-name.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/URL into your answers
company-name.maxlength: Company name must be 200 characters or less

landlord-email.maxlength: Email address must be 254 characters or less

landlord-phone.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/URL into your answers
landlord-phone.maxlength: Telephone number must be 16 characters or less
